name: @department-of-veterans-affairs/css-library
description: Department of Veterans Affairs stylesheets, tokens, and utilities

scripts.build:minify-rename: find dist/stylesheets/min -type f -name '*.css' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.css}.min.css"' {} \; && cp -r ./dist/stylesheets/min/* ./dist/stylesheets/ && rm -rf ./dist/stylesheets/min
scripts.build:minify-stylesheets: sass --style compressed --embed-source-map --load-path=./node_modules/@uswds/uswds/packages/ src/stylesheets:dist/stylesheets/min && yarn run build:minify-rename
scripts.build: yarn run clean-dist && yarn run copy && yarn build:tokens && yarn build:stylesheets && yarn copy:scss-files
scripts.copy:scss-files: cp -rv src/stylesheets/_override-function.scss dist/stylesheets/_override-function.scss && cp -rv src/stylesheets/_mixins.scss dist/stylesheets/_mixins.scss && cp -rv src/stylesheets/_functions.scss dist/stylesheets/_functions.scss && cp -rv src/stylesheets/formation-overrides/_variables.scss dist/stylesheets/formation-overrides/_variables.scss && mkdir -p dist/stylesheets/site && cp -rv src/stylesheets/site/* dist/stylesheets/site
scripts.copy-assets: cp -rv src/assets/fonts dist/fonts/ && cp -rv src/assets/img dist/img/
